speaker: Viral image
vclaim: “Joe Biden takes a knee after spotting an American flag near his childhood home in Pennsylvania.”
date: stated on July 11, 2020 in a Facebook post:
title: Photo shows Biden kneeling to talk to a child, not because he saw an American flag
text:
In June, Joe Biden, the presumptive Democratic presidential nominee, posed for a photo with activists and took a knee, a symbol of support for demonstrators protesting police brutality. 
But an image of the former vice president kneeling that’s circulating on Facebook does not show this moment. 
"Joe Biden takes a knee after spotting an American flag near his childhood home in Pennsylvania," reads the description above a photo of Biden kneeling in the middle of a street. 

Featured Fact-check
















Instagram posts


stated on January 12, 2021 in an Instagram post








Says Joe Biden stayed silent about violence at Black Lives Matter protests.












By Tom Kertscher • January 16, 2021







This post was flagged as part of Facebook’s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed. (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) 
The image does show Biden in Scranton, Penn., but he’s kneeling to talk with a child during a visit to his childhood home in July, according to the caption for the photo, which was taken by AP photographer Matt Slocum.
We rate this post False.
